content: Hello! I'm a complete newbie to FHIR. Would someone mind sparing 10min to answer my very basic questions in private message as I'm not sure if I understand concept of profiling correctly. I will appreciate for any help.

Our general preference is for questions to be asked in public because that way everyone benefits from the answers (including those who come along later and use the 'search' function. There are quite a few good intro tutorial videos on profiling, so you might want to consult those before asking your questions - try Googling "fhir devdays videos profiling". Whatever questions you have after that, we'll do our best to answer :)
